subject: Incorporate use of text/xml/excel files for test data
msgSnippet: Hi, What would be the best way to separate test data in the form of text files, excel or xml to keep the test data. The test code should pick the test data
messageBody:
Hi,
What would be the best way to separate test data in the form of text files, excel or xml to keep the test data. The test code should pick the test data from these files
Regards,
Rupa
